INGREDIENTS:

 • 1 cup all purporse flour
 • 1/2 cup finger miller flour (ragi flour) 
 • 1/2 cup of cocoa powder
 • 2 teaspoons baking powder
 • 1/4 teaspoon salt
 • 3 large eggs or Flaxmeal Egg Replacer
 • 1-1/4 cup brown sugar
 • 1 teaspoon vanilla essense
 • 1 cup milk or almond milk (vegan) 
 • 1 cup oil
 • 1 cup of mashed bananas

 METHOD: 
 1. To begin making the Chocolate Banana Finger Millet Cake Recipe, first get all the ingredients ready. 
 2. Next, preheat the oven to 180 C and grease and flour a large loaf pan or a spring foam pan or a bundt pan 
 3. Sift the flours, cocoa powder, along with baking powder and salt. Keep aside. I like to double sift the flours as it incorporates a good amount of air. 
 4. In a large bowl or the bowl of a KitchenAid Stand Mixer; add in the oil, sugar, eggs (Flaxmeal Egg Replacer), vanilla essense and milk. Beat together all the ingredients until combined. 
 5. Gradually beat in the flour mixture and finally the bananas. Beat until all the ingredients are well combined. 
 6. Pour the cake batter into the greased pan, place it into the oven to bake for about 35 to 45 minutes until a tester when inserted inside comes out clean. 
 7. Once the chocolate banana cake is baked, allow it to cool for a little bit before you can cut into slices. 
 8. Serve the Healthy Finger Millet Banana Chocolate Cake along with tea or coffee or even as a healthy snack for the kids.
